website_summaries.verdict: A smart power strip that comes with 6 surge-protected AC outlets.
pros: Protects computers, household electronics, and other devices from power surges and lightning strikes
Compatible with a variety of devices
Designed with overheat, over-voltage, over-current, and short-circuit protection
Equipped with a convenient 9.3-foot cord and 3 USB ports
cons: Plugs frequently fall out of the power strip
Bright light on the end of the power strip can be annoying

customer_reviews.title: Best power strip yet
customer_reviews.text: Love this power strip. Got it to sit neatly behind a tv stand, plug in is great, love the USB ports on it as well. If ever needing another, I will order this exact one again. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for modile devices but not for power bricks
customer_reviews.text: I love having a charger built into the power strip. I use a binder clip to keep the ends of the cords on the edge of my desk. My only complaint is that the plugs are not spaced to be able to handle the "brick" style power plugs. Plugging in just 1 brick takes up 2 or 3 of the outlets (depending on if it is plugged into the middle or one end).
customer_reviews.author: ARE Dad

customer_reviews.title: Good power strip with 3 handy USB ports
customer_reviews.text: I adhered this to the back of my nightstand with velcro strips. It works great to hide plugs and cords behind my nightstand. I appreciate having the 3 usb ports, and I keep a lightning cord plugged in there all the time. I also appreciate having the right angle plug. I use this in conjunction with theand the, which sit on top of my nightstand. I'm very happy with my setup, and I'd recommend this power strip.
customer_reviews.author: L. Greenwell

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the mounting holes
customer_reviews.text: Functions as intended. I'd give it 5 starts except for one thing: The mounting holes aren't in the same line and they are really small. You have to use very small headed screws and getting it square or level would be difficult. Put the mounting holes in the same plane and make it so that you could use standard #8 pan head screws and I'd have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McAfoos

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with how well this worked
customer_reviews.text: I have a number of other power strips, but the plug I wanted to use is right behind the dresser, so I couldn't get the dresser back close to the wall. This strip solved the problem by taking half the space and there is no pressure on the joint where the cord comes out of the plug. I was also able to free up several plugs in the strip, since three of the spaces I needed are for USB devices. Very happy with how well this worked.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Back

customer_reviews.title: It made charging all the batteries easy and handled the switch to 240v without a problem
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it a couple of months before leaving on a three week vacation to England and Africa in September 2017. If there were problems, I wanted to know before I left the states. It ran four to five camera battery chargers plus a Ravpower 60W for phones and Ipads. The only problem was the operator forgot to turn the switch on at the wall one night. After the wife pointed out the problem was me, there were no issues. It even ran in one spot in Africa off solar panels and a generator. It made charging all the batteries easy and handled the switch to 240v without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good and its a plus with the usb ports
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good comes in handy with the usb ports and so far happy with this purchase. Good quality works like it should doesnt feel cheap which is the best thing and been having it for months so its definitely worth the price and worth having if you need more outlets
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Works, but lose outlets
customer_reviews.text: I have this attached to the underside of my home desk. It does the job and it's nice having a power strip with USB ports so I don't have to use additional plug adapters. The only thing keeping it from being five stars is how lose the outlets are. I've had to use velcro strips to keep a couple items from falling out. I don't have that issue when I plug those same items into other power strips or outlets.
customer_reviews.author: jp be me

customer_reviews.title: Use these screws for mounting
customer_reviews.text: Love this extension bar but took off one star for odd shape screws in back. Had to take to Home Depot and they literally only had ONE size screw that worked for this. Use the attached photo and save yourself some trouble. The mounting hole is really small.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lin

customer_reviews.title: If you want an overly secure power strip, get this one...
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews have noted the plugs don't hold. I found I had to push the plugs in extra hard in order for them to stick or function. What this led to was the plugs being extra secure...to the point where it felt like the plugs could be damaged trying to remove them. So, I'm returning this one. I get if you want your plugs to be extra secure, but the Amazon power strip feels secure, but not to the point of having to forcefully yank out the plugs. Maybe it was just this one...either way, happy with my other purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eliot C.

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to plug into
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of the long cord, flat receptacle and USB outlets. The outlets on here are by far the hardest to plug things into that I have ever used. Don't plan on using this in an area where you will be plugging and unplugging things.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Plugs keep falling out because outlets are not sized properly
customer_reviews.text: This power strip is great because it's not as tall as older power strips, which means that it fits easier in tight spots. My one complaint, (and I'm not the only one who has said this) is that the outlets are too loose so for example my Roku keeps falling out because it's not tight enough to fit in. This is a bad enough issue that I am considering returning it and buying a product from another company.
customer_reviews.author: iccohen

customer_reviews.title: sleek reliable - 2nd purchase
customer_reviews.text: I liked this device so much that I bought a second one. Great to have usb and power strip in same device. I have it attached to surge UPS.
customer_reviews.author: Mack Hicks

customer_reviews.title: but the wall mount holes work great, if you can find a screw head small ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well. USB ports put out around 2 amps each. The cord is very long. I wish there was a way to ceiling mount it, but the wall mount holes work great, if you can find a screw head small enough to fit them.
customer_reviews.author: JGregory

customer_reviews.title: You must use some pressure to get plugs to go into outlets.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent power surge protector. Has six slots for standard plugs and three USB ports to charge phones or tablets. The plugs are real snug fit and will not fall out must use pressure to push plug into power bar. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Escobedo

customer_reviews.title: Fast USB outlets + efficient design
customer_reviews.text: This is a very efficient power strip as it allows multiple devices to recharge with USB plug-ins that are fast. Also, the other plug-ins are arranged so that larger plugs do not block other spaces from being used.
customer_reviews.author: South Dakota Farmboy

customer_reviews.title: The surge is great, but the plug ins are looser than my ...
customer_reviews.text: The surge is great , but the plug ins are looser than my normal wall plug ins and they keep falling out
customer_reviews.author: paulinejc

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: it works perfect on my desk! it allows me to connect my lights and charge my phone without having to buy another charger.
customer_reviews.author: juan doe

customer_reviews.title: Blends Seamlessly into the Background
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect. Works like a charm and because it is black blends seamlessly into the background at my charging station. I also love the flat plug as it is plug into an outlet behind a piece of furniture and this allows me to push the cabinet all the way back.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Stein

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I have an outlet in my bedroom that my bed was having issues with. This helped tremendously. It lays flat and doesn't stick out so that my bed can slide up against the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Rosentrater

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice but cord comes out of the TOP if you mount it vertically.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: So-so device
customer_reviews.text: Very practical with flat-plug 3-prong power outlet connector. Not so hot as surge protector as it didn't accept plug for convection oven. Could have done with fewer device plug-ins but more is better than less.
customer_reviews.author: DCReader1

customer_reviews.title: Good power strip
customer_reviews.text: Not a lot of surprises here - quality build and a good flat wall plug so it fits behind my TV stand. USB chargers work as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amighty

customer_reviews.title: Practical Design
customer_reviews.text: I wanted simple, practical and good design which is what I bought, I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David Manners

customer_reviews.title: Great slim strip
customer_reviews.text: Nice slim power strip, fits perfectly under my desk in the cable holder compartment
customer_reviews.author: David J. Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Very useful USB feature
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very useful. Works well. No complaints. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Maya DeLeina

customer_reviews.title: The item arrived on time and it works flawlessly. ...
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time and it works flawlessly. I purchased this power strip because it has USB ports I needed for charging my phone, mp3 player and other doodads. I would purchase from this vendor again when the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: egbee

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter who has exactly one outlet in her room that is, of course, where she MUST put her bed. I bought this particular product because it had the flat plug, long cord, and USB ports she needs at her desk to plug in her lamp and her Kindle Fire.
customer_reviews.author: RainmanP

customer_reviews.title: This power strip is great quality and very convenient
customer_reviews.text: This power strip is great quality and very convenient. I love being able to charge multiple devices without having a plug for each. The flat angled plug is perfect for fitting behind the sofa. And Nekteck's customer service is phenomenal!
customer_reviews.author: Blake B.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: USB port doesn't work update, the seller contacted me and offered to send me a new one. Received a new unit, works flawlessly. Awesome customer service. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it is a wonderful surge protector with an equally high quality long cord, the USB ports are a savior.
customer_reviews.author: TRENT

customer_reviews.title: Good color, nice design, and it does what you want it to.
customer_reviews.text: The angle of the plug is weird for me, but I'm sure it's just what others are looking for. That's a comment and not a complaint though. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: David Bohn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome power strip
customer_reviews.text: Awesome power strip. I would give it 5 stars, however it is almost impossible to mount since the holes for the screw heads are ridiculously small. Other than that, it works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tomko

customer_reviews.title: Amazing except on one of them I have the usb outlets don’t get power
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these. 2 are awesome. They have the slot on the back to attach securely to a wall. The third works as well except for the usb outlets which is weird.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it and the USB ports! I'm thinking about getting another one!
customer_reviews.author: Sleepysnails

customer_reviews.title: just what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: just what i was looking for. I mounted it in my Van to my converter and works good.
customer_reviews.author: romantower

customer_reviews.title: Feels very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great. I sometimes wonder why all outlet plugs aren't flat these days.
customer_reviews.author: Rob G

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: everything works as it should, all USB ports working, couldn't be happier. A+
customer_reviews.author: Brett H.

customer_reviews.title: Great But
customer_reviews.text: The power strip works well, there are enough slots for what I need. My only other comment is that it is heavier than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cord for its cost but, wish it was longer
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend it, but I wish it was 15 version instead of 9.6 version. It charges my iPods phone and rgb lights for my pc
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, powerful, and high quality. This is the power strip you should be buying if you want reliability.
customer_reviews.author: Damon J

customer_reviews.title: Did very well and has a stylish appearance. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Did very well and has a stylish appearance. It does seem well built, but only time will tell if that s true.
customer_reviews.author: J. Current

customer_reviews.title: God product; good service.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid feeling product that works perfectly. Love the wall flush plug. Delivered a day ahead of schedule.
customer_reviews.author: Wrk33n

customer_reviews.title: nice compact with usb
customer_reviews.text: good customer service, had issues with the first one but they were quick to give me a replacement and everything is working as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Mena

customer_reviews.title: convenient
customer_reviews.text: Got during a lightening deal on black friday. Love this power strip. My room only has one outlet so this is perfect for letting me plug multiple things in. I can ditch the bulky charger heads and plug my cords straight in.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, great design, and great functionality. I'm a big fan of this power strip!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: USB ports
customer_reviews.text: Plugs Works really well however whenever I plug in something to the USB ports the whole strip starts making a buzzing noise.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri

customer_reviews.title: working great.
customer_reviews.text: USBs are nice, also the flush plug was key for me. Working as expected, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bearly Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for an outlet behind a tight space. Plus, 3 USB charging ports? Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Mike P

customer_reviews.title: USB ports are rapid charge equipped.
customer_reviews.text: Rapid charges my Pixel and seems of good quality. I have no complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: datamatrix

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine. All these strips make the USB ports too close together.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyBo

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work great. Looks good too
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as ordered. Seems to work great. Looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so nice to have the usb ports on this and really like the long cord.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Wood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product it is awesome and advanced, I like the fact that it has the USB charging ports. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: JRomain

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a while now - no issues works well. Love the USB ports.
customer_reviews.author: Nandor

customer_reviews.title: Already thinking about buying another
customer_reviews.text: The 3 USB ports are so helpful with the six outlets as well. Also the black one is nice looking, sleek and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Grbich

customer_reviews.title: Power Strip
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to declutter cords on and around my desk. The compact size is perfect for the space.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bell

customer_reviews.title: It works great !
customer_reviews.text: So far this product has been working very well I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to live inside my smart panel to power devices for my home network (modem, router, switch, etc). It worked perfectly for that task. The build quality is great. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Daquino

customer_reviews.title: Great for all her plug-ins
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our teenagers room. Great for all her plug-ins.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A. Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: exactly what we needed. plenty of outlets as well as usb ports
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time and was exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Long cord, 6 outlets + usb ports.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hits all the needs, enough electrical outlets, 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: Hits all the needs, enough electrical outlets, 3 USB ports that all maximize charging rate, flat plug to hug the wall. The only improvement I would suggest is to turn the outlets 90 degrees so thin wallwarts will not occupy 2 slots.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Olson

customer_reviews.title: Charge Devices Easily
customer_reviews.text: These are great for a couple of reasons. It has a flat plug so it won't bend and break behind my bed and TV stand, it has a nice long cord to go behind furniture and make it easily reached, and it has 3 USB ports to charge my devices without taking up an outlet for other items.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Description Improved
customer_reviews.text: Original Review: The cord is not as long as it says in the description. It is shorter. Update: The length in the description has been updated since my original review. However, the length stated in the large ad picture is off by about 50%. Aside from that, it performs as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Nekobasu

customer_reviews.title: Plugs constantly fall out and need to be organized and ...
customer_reviews.text: Plugs constantly fall out and need to be organized and replugged - we have electric reclining couches / chairs / phones chargers / laptops - and it’s quite comical every night while trying to recline in a chair then fumbling trying to plug it back in - — u could be reclined and the dog hits it and u are stuck there -
customer_reviews.author: Sharona

customer_reviews.title: Really crappy quality. Very bright light on the end of ...
customer_reviews.text: Really crappy quality. Very bright light on the end of the strip for no reason is very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nekteck 6-Outlet Power Strip Surge Protector with 3 USB Ports, 5-Foot Long Cord, Flat Plug, Ideal for Travel Accessories, Mobile Devices, Personal Electronics, Small Appliances and More
feature_bullets: BUILT-IN SMART PROTECTION: It protects computers, peripherals, household electronics and other devices from power surge and lightning strikes 1700 Joule Energy Rating provides standard protection for your basic electronic devices.
MULTI-OUTLET FUNCTION: The Nekteck Power Strip has 6 surge-protected AC outlets that is compatible worldwide with 100-250V input and 3 built-in USB ports that provide 3A maximum.
SAFETY GUARANTEED: This power strip outlet is safety designed with overheat, over-voltage, over-current, short-circuit protection and anti-fire ABS+PC material.
COMPATIBILITY: USB can charge Apple and Android Phones, Ipad, Tablets, MP3, MP4, GPS and any other USB devices.
PACKAGE INCLUDES: Nekteck USB Power Strip [4.8ft Cord with 6AC + 3 USB], User Manual and 18-month Warranty

specifications.Plug Format: B - US style with ground plug.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars209 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
